EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Open House & DTF_London_Q316.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Pivotal Digital Transformation Forum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/digital-transformation-forum/london]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Digital Transformation Forum in London. See event details below:
Date: 13 September 2016 Time: 8:30 - 17:00 Location: Pivotal, The Bower, 211 Old Street, London EC1V 9NR
AGENDA <[[http://pivotal.io/event/digital-transformation-forum/london]]>
We look forward to meeting you soon!
The Pivotal Team
Questions? Please contact Phil Reay at preay@pivotal.io <[[mailto:preay@pivotal.io]]>.
